\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\ddots && \ddots & \ddots \\
	\ddots & X && X & X \\
	& X & X && X & X \\
	&& X & X && X
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=1-4, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=2-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=2-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=3-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=3-6, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{-\mathrm{id}_X}", from=3-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{id}_X}", from=4-4, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
